alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Highlands, eastern Hardee and eastern DeSoto Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Arcadia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Avon Park, Lake Placid, Sebring Regional Airport, Sylvan Shores, Sweetwater, Lake Josephine, Placid Lakes, Avon Park Executive Airport, Avon Park Air Force Range, Crewsville and Sebring Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
